TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlTextWriter extends System.Xml.XmlWriter

summary.span: Represents a writer that provides a fast, non-cached, forward-only way of generating streams or files containing XML data that conforms to the W3C Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 and the Namespaces in XML recommendations.

span.span: Represents a writer that provides a fast, non-cached, forward-only way of generating streams or files containing XML data that conforms to the W3C Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 and the Namespaces in XML recommendations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，我们建议您创建使用的实例方法和类，以充分利用新功能。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create instances by using the method and the class to take advantage of new functionality. 如果编写器用来构造`TextWriter`派生自`StreamWriter`类，此属性等效于属性。If the writer was constructed using a `TextWriter` that is derived from the `StreamWriter` class, this property is equivalent to the property. 如果编写器用来构造，此属性返回`Stream`传递给构造函数。If the writer was constructed using a , this property returns the `Stream` passed to the constructor. 如果编写器已构造的使用文件名，此属性返回`Stream`表示的文件。If the writer was constructed using a file name, this property returns the `Stream` representing the file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteStartDocument() cil managed

summary.span: Writes the XML declaration with the version "1.0".

span.span: Writes the XML declaration with the version "1.0".

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，我们建议您创建使用的实例方法和类，以充分利用新功能。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create instances by using the method and the class to take advantage of new functionality. 由编写器的实现方式确定文档的编码级别。The encoding level of the document is determined by how the writer is implemented. 例如，如果中指定对象`XmlTextWriter`构造函数中，这决定了编码属性的值。For example, if an object is specified in the `XmlTextWriter` constructor, this determines the value of the encoding attribute. 此方法不创建独立属性。This method does not create a standalone attribute. 当`WriteStartDocument`调用编写器验证你正在编写是格式正确的 XML 文档。When `WriteStartDocument` is called the writer validates that what you are writing is a well-formed XML document. 例如，它会检查 XML 声明是第一个节点，一个并只有一个根级别元素存在，等等。For example, it checks that the XML declaration is the first node, that one and only one root-level element exists and so on. 如果未调用此方法，编写器将假定 XML 片段写入，并且不应用任何根级别规则。If this method is not called, the writer assumes an XML fragment is being written and applies no root level rules. 如果`WriteStartDocument`已调用，然后方法用于创建另一个 XML 声明，则会引发异常。If `WriteStartDocument` has been called and then the method is used to create another XML declaration, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 以下示例将编写一个表示一书的 XML 文件。The following example writes an XML file representing a book. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.WriteStartDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.WriteStartDocument Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.WriteStartDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.WriteStartDocument Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.WriteStartDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.WriteStartDocument Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: This is not the first write method called after the constructor.

span.span: This is not the first write method called after the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，我们建议您创建使用的实例方法和类，以充分利用新功能。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create instances by using the method and the class to take advantage of new functionality. 调用此方法可以写入属性也可以创建后使用的内容， ，或的子元素。After calling this method you can either write attributes or create content using , , or for child elements. 你可以关闭具有元素中哪些时间结束标记写出。You can close the element with at which time an end tag is written out. ## Examples 下面的示例写出一本书。The following example writes out a book. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.WriteStartElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.WriteStartElement Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.WriteStartElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.WriteStartElement Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.WriteStartElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.WriteStartElement Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteString(string text) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub WriteString (text As String)

param.name: text
param.span: Text to write.

span.span: Text to write.

summary.span: Writes the given text content.

span.span: Writes the given text content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，我们建议您创建使用的实例方法和类，以充分利用新功能。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create instances by using the method and the class to take advantage of new functionality. `WriteString` 执行以下任务`WriteString` does the following - 字符`&`， `<`，并`>`替换为`&`， `<`，并`>`分别。The characters `&`, `<`, and `>` are replaced with `&`, `<`, and `>`, respectively. - 在范围 0-0x1f （不包括空白字符 0x9、 0xA 和 0xD） 中的字符值替换为数字字符实体 (`�`通过`�x1F`)。Character values in the range 0x-0x1F (excluding white space characters 0x9, 0xA, and 0xD) are replaced with numeric character entities (`�` through `�x1F`). - 如果`WriteString`调用中的属性值的上下文中，双引号和单引号将替换`"`和`'`分别。If `WriteString` is called in the context of an attribute value, double and single quotes are replaced with `"` and `'` respectively. 例如，此输入字符串`testtest`编写为For example, this input string `testtest` is written as ``` test<item>test ``` 如果`text`可以是`null`或`String.Empty`，此方法会写入任何数据内容的文本节点。If `text` is either `null` or `String.Empty`, this method writes a text node with no data content. ## Examples 下面的示例写出 XML 片段。The following example writes an XML fragment. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.Formatting Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.Formatting Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.Formatting Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.Formatting Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.Formatting Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.Formatting Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: The text string contains an invalid surrogate pair.

span.span: The text string contains an invalid surrogate pair.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void WriteSurrogateCharEntity (char lowChar, char highChar);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteSurrogateCharEntity(char lowChar, char highChar) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub WriteSurrogateCharEntity (lowChar As Char, highChar As Char)
public: override void WriteSurrogateCharEntity(char lowChar, char highChar);

param.name: lowChar
param.span: The low surrogate.

span.span: The low surrogate.

param.span: This must be a value between and .

span.span: This must be a value between and .

param.name: highChar
param.span: The high surrogate.

span.span: The high surrogate.

param.span: This must be a value between and .

span.span: This must be a value between and .

summary.span: Generates and writes the surrogate character entity for the surrogate character pair.

span.span: Generates and writes the surrogate character entity for the surrogate character pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，我们建议您创建使用的实例方法和类，以充分利用新功能。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create instances by using the method and the class to take advantage of new functionality. 此方法仅适用于使用 utf-16 编码的系统。This method is only applicable on systems that use UTF-16 encoding. 代理项字符实体以十六进制格式编写。The surrogate character entity is written in hexadecimal format. 代理项字符的范围是`#x10000`到`#x10FFFF`。The range for surrogate characters is `#x10000` to `#x10FFFF`. 下面的公式用于生成代理项字符实体: (`highChar` - `0xD800`) \* `0x400` + (`lowChar` - `0xDC00`) + `0x10000`。The following formula is used to generate the surrogate character entity: (`highChar` - `0xD800`) \* `0x400` + (`lowChar` - `0xDC00`) + `0x10000`. 对于 HTML 和 XML，文档字符集 （和数字字符引用表示法） 基于 UCS [ISO 10646]。For both HTML and XML, the document character set (and therefore the notation of numeric character references) is based on UCS [ISO-10646]. 源文档中的单个数字字符引用可能会因此在某些情况下对应于字符串 （一个高代理项和低代理项） 中的两个 16 位单位。A single numeric character reference in a source document may therefore in some cases correspond to two 16-bit units in a string (a high surrogate and a low surrogate). 这些 16 位单元称为代理项对。These 16-bit units are referred to as a surrogate pair. 有关代理项或多个字符的详细信息，请参阅的部分 3.7 的 Unicode 标准 3.0/Unicode 2.0 位于http://www.unicode.org，或在位于 W3C XML 1.0 建议的第 2.2 节http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml#charsets。For more information regarding surrogates or characters, refer to section 3.7 of the Unicode 3.0/Unicode 2.0 standard located at http://www.unicode.org, or section 2.2 of the W3C XML 1.0 Recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml#charsets.

exception.span: An invalid surrogate character pair was passed.

span.span: An invalid surrogate character pair was passed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，我们建议您创建使用的实例方法和类，以充分利用新功能。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create instances by using the method and the class to take advantage of new functionality. 此方法用于手动格式化文档。This method is used to manually format your document. 使用属性能够自动格式化输出的编写器。Use the property to have the writer format the output automatically. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`WriteWhitespace`方法可控制如何设置该文件的格式。The following example uses the `WriteWhitespace` method to control how the file is formatted. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.XmlSpace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.XmlSpace Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.XmlSpace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.XmlSpace Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.XmlSpace Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlTextWriter.XmlSpace Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，我们建议您创建使用的实例方法和类，以充分利用新功能。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, we recommend that you create instances by using the method and the class to take advantage of new functionality. 此属性允许要找出所处的状态的另一个组件已离开的编写器中的一个组件。This property allows one component to find out what state another component has left the writer in. 例如，可能是一个组件希望告知另一要生成哪些语言的帮助文本。For example, perhaps one component wants to tell another which language help text to generate. 语言信息传递通过编写`xml:lang`属性。The language information is communicated by writing an `xml:lang` attribute.
